title: Chalcis
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Chalcis, from a wide variety of genres like Entertainment, Greek, Hits, Pop and Top 40.  Enjoy stations such as Hit FM Chalkida, Kosmos FM 100, Radio Astro, Avanti 101,2, Radio 1 98.1 and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radio_info.short: Their love for music and culture, led us to create a radio and a website to promote good and quality music and cultural events. The
radio_info.rest: center of activity is the city of Lamia right in the center of Greece and recipients of all conscious listeners throughout Greece and the world. The station's program contains old and new foreign hits from all genres of music. Panhellenic exclusives, interviews, musical tributes and collaborations with the top names from the world of music is part of the program.
